# adType

**Instance Property**

The type of the ad.

## Declaration

```swift
var adType: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is not used.

## Describing ads

- **adDescription**: A human-readable description of the ad.
- **adPurchaserName**: The name of the entity that purchased the ad.
